title: Bigg Boss 13:Bigg Boss 13 'Weekend Ka War': Angry Salman Khan Blasts Contestants, Says He Didn't Want To Come
text:
After the dramatic week and series of events that conspired in the Bigg Boss 13 house, host Salman Khan will be seen in angry avatar as he addresses the contestants. Salman Khan will lose his cool again as he will talk about the physical and verbal spats that took place in the house.

Salman will be seen scolding Paras Chhabra, Asim Riaz, Siddharth Dey to Shefali Bagga for their objectionable choice of words in the episode that will be aired tonight. In a new promo released by the channel, is seen starting the Weekend Ka Waar Diwali special episode on a sarcastic note.

“Wow, what a week it was! It was so much fun. You all have rocked the entire television industry and this has never happened in history. The entire credit goes to all of you. You are such big celebrities, your parents have been praised on the show. You have shown the entire country who you are, you are idols. Outstanding!”, says an Angry Salman.

Salman questions Paras Chhabra and Asim Riaz for their unruly behavior inside the house. He says,

Don't Miss 132 SHARES 811 SHARES 1.5 K SHARES 29.8 K SHARES

“The things he said, it was obvious that it will lead to a fist fight.” Asim replied in his defence that Paras abused his family members. To this, Paras replied, “What else I would have done? Am I supposed to listen to everything he had to say?”

Scolding Paras and Dey, Salman says,

“If its getting so much, give it back to each other and get out of the show.”

Targeting Paras who has mentioned that ‘Salman sir ka chik chik thoda zyada ho ra ha (Salman is saying a bit too much)’, Salman clearly said, “I don’t care about your opinion about me.” Salman's next target was Shefali Bagga and he asked her if she had the right to give a character certificate to Shehnaaz Gill.

He says,“Naam kamao, badnaam hoke mat jao yaha se (Earn a name, don’t lose your respect). I didn’t want to come here in the first place."

Salman has always been personally involved on the show and fans love how he involves and gives everyone the right dose when needed.
